data.text:
@neilbosworth @stefanbar @cobuspienaar 

Hi Neil

i have completed the database side of this a while ago and waited on a front end developer to complete the front end alert/notification for the capturer.
We had a discussion on the front end alert functionality and you mention that you want to spec the how the alert should exactly function.

Please confirm how you would like the alert/notification to work on a capturer screen.
